title: Beef stew with light herby dumplings
description: A little bit of patience will be rewarded with this rich beef stew with parsnip, butternut squash and fluffy dumplings.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz lean stewing beef, all visible fat removed
1 litre/1¾ pints beef stock, made from 2 low-sodium cubes
3 carrots, 1 finely chopped, rest cut into chunks
pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley or thyme (depending on preference)
